Are you looking for an entertaining and educational game for your children? Look no further than Animal Jam! This massively-multiplayer online game is perfect for kids aged 7-11 who love animals and exploration. In this article, we’ll give you an overview of what makes Animal Jam such a great choice for parents and children alike.

## What is Animal Jam?

Animal Jam is a virtual world where kids can create and customize their own animal characters, explore different environments, and interact with other players from all around the world. Each player’s animal avatar can be decorated with all kinds of different clothing items and accessories, while the game’s maps are designed to encourage learning and exploration. 

## What sets Animal Jam apart?

While many games for kids offer little more than mindless entertainment, Animal Jam stands out as an educational tool as well. The game is full of facts about animals, ecosystems, and environmental science, so your child will have fun while simultaneously learning about the world around them.

Furthermore, Animal Jam is designed with safety in mind. The game’s chat feature is regulated and moderated by a team of trained staff members who ensure that all conversations remain appropriate and respectful. Additionally, this game is available on a variety of platforms, so you can easily manage your child’s access and monitor their online activity.

## What can my child do in Animal Jam?

In Animal Jam, your child can adopt, customize, and interact with a wide range of animals, from domestic pets like cats and dogs to exotic creatures like dolphins and jaguars. They can also explore different regions, such as the savannah, jungle, and ocean, and complete mini-games based on different environmental themes. 

In addition, using in-game currency, your child can purchase clothing, accessories, and even den decorations to create a cozy home for their animal avatar. With a variety of educational opportunities and entertaining activities, Animal Jam is a perfect virtual world for young children.

## Conclusion

Animal Jam is a great online game that offers both entertainment and education for children aged 7-11. With its focus on animal facts and environmental science, your child can learn about the natural world while having fun. Plus, the game’s moderated chat feature and availability on multiple platforms make it a safe option for parents to monitor their child’s activity. 

If you’re looking for a safe and engaging game for your child, give Animal Jam a try. You won’t be disappointed!
